useCase.name: Create Report Template
useCase.description: Create a report template by adding rows to the template.

preconditions.precondition: The Template Admin is logged in.

mainSequence.step: Template Admin creates a report template.
Template Admin adds rows to the template.
The Row Template instance is returned to the Row Template Factory.
The Row Template instance is returned to the Report Template.
The Report Template instance is returned to the Report Template Factory.
The Report Template instance is returned to the Template Admin.
